item.description:
Come play Cribbage! 

Join players from the American Cribbage Congress which runs cribbage tournaments and has grassroots clubs throughout the country.

 This is a event geared more toward experienced players. There is a charge of $3 per week.  We rent the hall from the Moose club and provide boards and cards.  In addition, most people enter something called a $5 Q pool. We play 9 games against 9 different opponets and if you do better than 75% of the other players you get back anywhere from $30 to $10 depending on how well you do.  Wins count for two point, skunks count for three points.  Thirteen points for the nine games is usually enough to win Q pool money. 

 

Contact Paul at (860) 871-0834 for more detials on this regular event.

For more information please visit the American Cribbage Congress website: 

www.cribbage.org

Philip Martin (local chapter president)
860-666-8300
Email Contact: Philip Martin
phil29@netzero.net
(not currently part of our group)

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Weekly Cribbage Mondays
